en-US.description: Relive the nostalgia of إذاعة القرآن الكريم من القاهرة - Cairo Quran Radio 24/7. For decades, this treasured station has been the spiritual heartbeat of Egyptian homes, awakening families for Fajr and accompanying them throughout the day. Now, wherever life has taken you, reconnect with the sacred voices that raised generations of believers. Perfect for Egyptians abroad who long for the comfort of home and the blessed recitations that echo through the streets of Cairo.
examplePhrases: Alexa ask Cairo Quran Radio to play
Alexa tell Cairo Quran Radio to pause
en-US.name: Cairo Quran Radio 24/7
en-US.summary: إذاعة القرآن الكريم من القاهرة - Bringing the nostalgic sounds of home to Egyptians worldwide.
